name: 3x3
description:
Back when I was a little girl I thought there was nothing as cool as being able to add and subtract from your watch. I imagined being able to do it at school and really wanted to have a calculator watch! Now I do the math in my phone but still think calculator watches  are just plain cool!

This is a sturdy cuff is casted in 925 silver. It has a polished matte finish. It was casted in Florence, Italy in a small foundry where they do artistic castings, Due to this it has some imperfections in its surface which are part of the rough worn look.

This particular cuff is 10% due to a small hole in its face due to the casting.

Back when I was a little girl I thought there was nothing as cool as being able to add and subtract from your watch. I imagined being able to do it at school and really wanted to have a calculator watch! Now I do the math in my phone but still think calculator watches  are just plain cool!

This is a sturdy cuff is casted in 925 silver. It has a firescale oxidation finish giving it personality and the look of times past. It was casted in Florence, Italy in a small foundry where they do artistic castings, Due to this it has some imperfections in its surface which are part of the rough worn look.

name: En la Caleta
description:
The small street in old San Juan leading from the old wall door to the Cathedral is full of big beautiful trees that give shade to the blue cobblestone street and its colorful colonial buildings. The vibrant charm of this steep street evokes times past where ladies dressed in lace and put up their long tresses in loose and sexy up-dos. At least that´s my take on it!! 

This beautiful hair piece will instantly transform your hairdo in to a jeweled experience. Colorful resin stones in a red brass setting, all hand made from the stones to the hammered comb legs. It is a beautiful playful take on the haircombs of times past!

The haircomb measures 8.5cm (3.6in) by 6.5cm (2.5 in)

name: Orient Express
description:
The famous train the Orient Express conjures in my mind fabulously dressed women with stunning jewelry to match. Taking passengers in luxury from Paris to Istanbul this iconic train ran from 1883 to 2009, but there is not doubt that is glory days were the roaring 20´s and 30´s. 

This stunning earrings will make you feel like a passenger on its way to Constantinople! All handmade, the stones are pigment infused resin stones set in a shiny red brass setting. Red Brass or Fool´s gold has a yellow gold color similar to 14k gold. This earrings are a bit asymmetrical giving them personality and adding to their distinct handmade charm. All findings are also handmade using brass wire.

The earring wire measures 0.9mm( 19.5 gauge). The measurement of the longer earring is 8cm(3.5in) long x 1.75cm (0.6in). The shorter earring measures 7.2cm (2.75 in) X 1.8cm (0.7in).

name: Bites
description:
Small intense bright  stones. Sea blue stones. Grass green stones and rosey rose stones

This bright pigment infused stones are set in silver filled beds. The earring post of this bite size earrings is sterling silver. The earrings are a bit asymmetrical giving the feel of stones found on a sunny walk by the beach or by the river bed.

The earring post is 0.9cm (19.5 gauge). The Blue earrings measure 1.4 cm (0.6 in) by 1.1 cm (0.43in) . The green earrings measure 1 cm (0.39in) by 1.2 (0.47in). The rose  earrings measure 1cm (0.39) by 1.1cm (0.43)

name: By the River bed
description:
On the river bed wild flowers grow amidst the stones and pebbles. Colors and textures mix and contrast next to the ever moving clear water of the river while the soft breeze cools you under the warm sun.

A cluster of pigment infused resin stones hangs from the pebble like piece of polymer clay. The boldly hued hand cut resin stones are set in a bed of red brass. Out of the polymer clay a delicate handmade chain of brass wire adds a delicate contrast to the piece which ends in the resin stone closure. 

The resin and polymer piece measures 7 cm (2.75in) by 7.7cm (3in). the diameter of the necklace is 23 cm (8in).

name: Sol Solecito
description:
Sol solecito calientame un poquito hoy y mañana y toda la semana. 
Sun little sun warm up a bit, Today and tomorrow and all of the week.
A Children's poem for those cloudy cold days.

Bright yellow pigments infused these resin stones with a beautiful intense color making you think of sunny days. They are set on silver filled whose rough finish ans slight fire scaling contrasts with the brightness of the stones. The findings are also all handmade and are sterling silver wire.

The silver wire findings measure 0.9cm ( 19.5 gauge). the earrings measure 8.2 cm  (3.5 in) long by 2.4 cm (0.9in). They are very light and comfortable to wear.

name: En mi Viejo San Juan
description:
In my island of Puerto Rico there is a jewel of a neighborhood, The colorful Old San Juan. Here no two houses are of the same color and the city blocks are filled with colorful buildings that bring a joy and beauty without equal. 

Bright yellow, blue and red pigment infused hand cut stones set shiny red brass makes this one eye catching piece! The necklace chain also handmade are irregualar circles that add to the charm of the this boldy colored necklace.

The diameter of the necklace is 15.8cm (6.25in).

name: Canditi
description:
To conserve the aromas and flavors of certain fruits they are dipped in a sugary syrup that raises their sugar content and conserves them. The word comes from the sanskrit word for sugar. This little sugary morsels fill many a desserts giving them a intense sugary kick.

A deep crimson resin stone set in red brass makes this little ring. The stone pigment infused resin with a sprinkle of silver dust. The red brass setting rough and a bit assymetrical to give the ring its own personality and charm. 

The ring is a size 7, measuring 1.9 cm (0.75in) in diameter .

name: Summer Nights
description:
Hot summer nights in which the heat of day is still felt and one is out and about enjoying the night after playing in the sun all day.

This beautiful red brass earrings are accentuated by the hand cut pigment infused resin stones. The earrings have a rough finish and an asymmetry that adds to their charm. All the findings are also handmade using brass wire.

The earrings measure 7.6 cm (3 in.) long by 1.9cm (.75in). The brass wire measure 0.9 cm (19.5 gauge). The are very light and comfortable to wear!

name: Cotton
description:
As I look out my window in to the morning sky I enjoy the beautiful white and blue. The California sky is filled with fluffy streaks of white cotton clouds that contrast with the intense blue of this sunshiny morning. Ahh.... Makes me want to stretch like a cat in the warm rays and cool sea breeze.

White and blue pigments infused this handcut resin stones. Thick and opaque colors  set in silver- filled and finished with sterling silver wire findings.  A slight fire- scale oxidation gives the silver-filled metal a rough and antique feel.The roundish stones are of slight different sizes and shapes highlighting the blue streaks in the white stones. 

The silver wire measures 0.9cm (19.5 gauge). The earrings measure approx. 7.6 cm (3in) long by 1.3cm (0.6in)

name: Azul Caribe
description:
The Caribbean sea has many shades of blue . From the  deep blues of the waters far from land to the blue-greens of the shores one can see blues as far as the eye can. But it is the turquoise blue that most sparkles clear yet intense one can peer in to its depth and just by looking at it feel refreshed.

This small yet bold ring is of an intense turquoise blue. A pigment infused resin stone set in a small red brass setting and finish with a delicate brass wire ring. It slightly rustic setting gives charm and lots of personality. Wear it alone or stacked with other of the single small stone rings!

This ring is a size 6.5, measuring 1.8cm ( 0.73in). Measurements are approximates.

name: Calle Luna Calle Sol
description:
In colorful Old San Juan buildings are of beautiful colors. No two that are near can be of the same color of shade giving my beautiful city by the sea a lively and happy energy. 

This colorful ring has six different colored stones. All resin stones made with pigments and hand cut and polished. They are set in a base of red brass also called fool's gold for its similar 14k gold color. The ring base is a thin brass wire.

The ring is a size 8, measuring 1.85cm (0.72 in) in diameter. The stone face measures 3.4 cm (1.3in) x 2.5cm (1 in). It is very light and comfortable to wear.

name: Rosso
description:
In medieval times red was the most expensive dye. It's rich dark color was hard to achieve, few being able to afford the painstaking work needed to have even a bit of this magnificent color.

Deep red pigment infused resin stones set on Red Brass also known as Fool's Gold, earrings. Asymmetrical stones and a rough finish add to a look of time passed. Brass wire findings are all handmade.

Brass wire measures 0.9mm (19.5 gauge). The earrings measure 8.5cm (3.3in) long x 1.2 cm (0.5in) at its widest point

name: Goodbye my winter suit
description:
Spring is finally here! And with it hundreds of wild flowers that give color to the mountains and fields. 

This tri- colored ring is set on a sterling silver base. The colorful stones are pigment infused hand cut resin. The ring band is a thin silver wire. It is a delicate and sweet ring.

The ring size is 5, measuring 1.5 cm (0.6in) in diameter. The stones measure 2 cm (0.8 in) x 2 cm (0.8 in)

name: Sand
description:
In the long winter days my feet crave the feel of the soft sand. Fine grain sand that feels cool on my sun soaked feet and arms. 

This pair of earrings is sterling silver with pigment infused hand cut resin stones. Silver wire was used in the findings. The earrings are a bit asymmetric one stone being slightly bigger than the other.

The silver wire measures 9mm (19.5 gauge). The measurement of the earrings is 4.5 cm (1.75 in) long and 1.5 cm (0.7in) wide

name: Stepping stones
description:
In the Spanish Village at Balboa Park the floor is full of beautiful colors. Tiles of painted colors fill the this quaint artist's village with energy and happiness. 

This colorful ring has four pigment infused resin stones all different sizes and shapes. It is set in a red brass base and finished with a thin red brass wire. 

The ring is size 5 having a 1.4 cm (0.55 in) diameter . The face measures 2.8 cm (1.1 in) x 2.3 cm (0.9 in) .

name: Ice Ice baby
description:
As the hot summer months approach  a cold ice can refresh the heat of the sultry days. Be it ice cubes in your lemonade or a cold ice cube in your neck, this earrings will make you feel refreshed,

Silver- filled earrings with hand cut pigment infused resin stones. Siilver wire findings are also all handmade. a slight asymmetry and a rough finish give  add to the piece's playfulness.

The silver wire measures 0.9mm (19.5 gauge). The measurement of the earrings is 8.5cm (3.37 in) long x 1.5 cm (0.7 in) wide

name: Walk like an Egyptian
description:
A playful take on the jewelry of ancient times, perfect for walking like an egyptian.

Red brass commonly known as fool's gold dangle earrings with hand cut pigment infused resin stones. This stunning earrings are all handmade. One being slightly bigger than the other add to this piece's charm and personality. All findings are handmade of brass wire.

The earring wire measures 0.9mm( 19.5 gauge). The measurement of the longer earring is 8cm(3.5in) long x 1.75cm (0.6in). The shorter earring measures 7.2cm (2.75 in) X 1.8cm (0.7in).
